problems.description: Implement a simplified heap sort algorithm to sort the given input list of numbers. Build a max heap from the array, then repeatedly extract the maximum element and place it at the end to sort in ascending order. Example: [64,66,20,49,11,79,21,20,99] should become [11,20,20,21,49,64,66,79,99]. Only JavaScript is allowed.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted numbers. It may be of arbitrary length.
problems.expected description: An array of numbers sorted in ascending order.

problems.description: Find the k largest elements from an array using a heap-based approach. Build a min-heap of size k and iterate through the array, replacing the smallest element in the heap when a larger element is found, then extract all elements to get the k largest in descending order. Example: Given [3,2,1,5,6,4] and k=2, the result should be [6,5]. Only JavaScript is allowed.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of integers and an integer k.
problems.expected description: An array of integers containing the k largest elements in descending order.

problems.description: Sort an array where each element is at most k positions away from its sorted position using a heap-based approach. Maintain a min-heap of size k+1 and process elements by inserting into the heap and extracting the minimum to place in the sorted position, which efficiently handles the limited disorder. Example: Given [6,5,3,2,8,10,9] and k=3, the result should be [2,3,5,6,8,9,10]. Only JavaScript is allowed.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of integers and an integer k.
